channel.title: Comments on: Like The Rain? There’s a Website For You

item.title: By: Amit Schreiber

item.description:
In reply to <a href="/old-blog/3778/comment-page-1#comment-2013713">Moria</a>.
Very appropriate. You must be excited about today's upcoming storm :-)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Moria.

Very appropriate. You must be excited about today’s upcoming storm :-)

item.title: By: Moria
item.dc:creator: Moria
item.description: Thanks for the recommendation ;) As for today (specifically), I would like to share with you this song :) https://youtu.be/mudlkrSMeWw
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for the recommendation ;)

item.title: By: Amit Schreiber
item.dc:creator: Amit Schreiber
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/old-blog/3778/comment-page-1#comment-2013710">Roman Govsheev</a>.
Never! I love the sun. Some people say it's weird because my birthday is in January :)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Roman Govsheev.

Never! I love the sun. Some people say it’s weird because my birthday is in January :)
